FileFormat.FormatDescription: Autorun.inf is the primary instruction file associated with the Autorun function. Autorun.inf itself is a simple text-based configuration file that tells the operating system which executable to start, which icon to use, and which additional menu commands to make available.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: ASCII: [autorun]..open= or [autorun]..icon. Open and icon can be upper or lowercase.
